verses.verse: And Abram <S%H87><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, he, and his wife <S%H802><s%>, and all that he had, and Lot <S%H3876><s%> with him, into the south <S%H5045><s%>.
And Abram <S%H87><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> rich <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in cattle <S%H4735><s%>, in silver <S%H3701><s%>, and in gold <S%H2091><s%>.

And he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on his journeys <S%H4550><s%> from the south <S%H5045><s%> even to Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, unto the place <S%H4725><s%> where his tent <S%H168><s%> had been <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at the beginning <S%H8462><s%>, between Beit-El <S%H1008><s%> and Hai <S%H5857><s%>;

Unto the place <S%H4725><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, which he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> there at the first <S%H7223><s%>: and there Abram <S%H87><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
And Lot <S%H3876><s%> also, which went <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with <S%H854><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%>, had flocks <S%H6629><s%>, and herds <S%H1241><s%>, and tents <S%H168><s%>.

And the land <S%H776><s%> was not able to bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, that they might dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>: for their substance <S%H7399><s%> was great <S%H7227><s%>, so that they could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not dwell <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>.

And there was a strife <S%H7379><s%> between the herdmen <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Abram's <S%H87><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%> and the herdmen <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Lot's <S%H3876><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%>: and the Kanahanite <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> then in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Lot <S%H3876><s%>, Let there be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no <S%H408><s%> strife <S%H4808><s%>, I pray thee, between me and thee, and between my herdmen <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and thy herdmen <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; for we <S%H582><s%> be brethren <S%H251><s%>.

Is not the whole land <S%H776><s%> before thee <S%H6440><s%>? separate thyself <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8734><s%>, I pray thee, from me: if thou wilt take the left hand <S%H8040><s%>, then I will go to the right <S%H3231><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; or if thou depart to the right hand <S%H3225><s%>, then I will go to the left <S%H8041><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And Lot <S%H3876><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and beheld <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the plain <S%H3603><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, that it was well watered <S%H4945><s%> every where, before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> destroyed <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8763><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>, even as the garden <S%H1588><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, like the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, as thou comest <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto Zoar <S%H6820><s%>.

Then Lot <S%H3876><s%> chose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him all the plain <S%H3603><s%> of Yarden <S%H3383><s%>; and Lot <S%H3876><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> east <S%H6924><s%>: and they separated themselves <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8735><s%> the one <S%H376><s%> from the other <S%H251><s%>.

Abram <S%H87><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, and Lot <S%H3876><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the plain <S%H3603><s%>, and pitched his tent <S%H167><s%> <S%H8799><s%> toward <S%H5704><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%>.
But the men <S%H582><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> were wicked <S%H7451><s%> and sinners <S%H2400><s%> before the YY <S%H3068><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> that Lot <S%H3876><s%> was separated <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8736><s%> from him, Lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and look <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from the place <S%H4725><s%> where thou art northward <S%H6828><s%>, and southward <S%H5045><s%>, and eastward <S%H6924><s%>, and westward <S%H3220><s%>:
For all the land <S%H776><s%> which thou seest <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, to thee will I give it <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.

And I will make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> as the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: so that <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H376><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> number <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, then shall thy seed <S%H2233><s%> also be numbered <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8690><s%> through the land <S%H776><s%> in the length <S%H753><s%> of it and in the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of it; for I will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it unto thee.

Then Abram <S%H87><s%> removed his tent <S%H167><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the plain <S%H436><s%> of Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, which is in Hevron <S%H2275><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
